{"step_by_step_thinking": "Centric interference and working interference are types of occlusal interferences that can cause discomfort and problems in the natural dentition. They can be removed by reducing the supporting cusps in natural dentition. However, this should be done carefully and judiciously to avoid unnecessary removal of tooth structure and to maintain the integrity of the tooth. Therefore, while it is possible, it is generally recommended to avoid it unless absolutely necessary.", "answer_choice": "C. Yes but we should avoid it"}
